definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: So the lattice has a bunch of vibrational energies.
sentences.chinese: 晶格有大量的振动能级。

sentences.english: The paper describes that electronic and rotating-vibration energy levels in materials decide spectral selectivity.
sentences.chinese: 材质中电子能级和振转能级决定光谱的选择性。

sentences.english: The paper describes that electronic and rotating-vibration energy levels in materials decide spectral selectivity.
sentences.chinese: 材质中电子能级和振转能级决定光谱的选择性。

sentences.english: Or oxygen energy levels. They look like this.
sentences.chinese: 或氧的能级，它们看起来就像这个。

sentences.english: The method that is used in controling spontaneous emission of a two-level or three-level atom in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 这篇论文研究了一种控制多能级原子自发辐射的方法。

sentences.english: The molecule can be simplified as a three-level system.
sentences.chinese: 在低能量范围内，该分子可以简化为三能级体系。

sentences.english: The Kerr nonlinearity of a left-handed material is analyzed in a four-level atomic system.
sentences.chinese: 分析了四能级原子系统中左手材料的克尔非线性特性。

sentences.english: We cannot have two 1s's sitting at the same level.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能是两个1s电子同时在一个能级上。

sentences.english: Through scaling transform, field F and energy level E are replaced by parameter t.
sentences.chinese: 通过标度变换，引入t参量代替能级E和外电场F。

sentences.english: From a three-level model, we analyse the origins of the observed dnamics.
sentences.chinese: 从一个三能级模型出发，分析了上述过程的来源。

sentences.english: The results are also valid for other quasi-three-level laser systems.
sentences.chinese: 结论同样适用于其他的准三能级激光器。

sentences.english: In this paper we investigate the energy of charged particle and Landau energy levels with the bound of two-dimensional infinite potential well.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论二维无限深势阱中的能级和朗道能级。

sentences.english: In this paper we investigate the energy of charged particle and Landau energy levels with the bound of two-dimensional infinite potential well.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论二维无限深势阱中的能级和朗道能级。

sentences.english: The energy levels of the electron are not sensitively dependent on the outer radius.
sentences.chinese: 电子能级并不敏感地依赖于环的外径。

sentences.english: What happens is these two levels displace.
If I look at those nitrogen vibrational energy levels.
sentences.chinese: 如果我来看那些氮的振动能级。
